item.description:
Sunday afternoon/evening Dinner Social

Come join the Tolland CT Ron Paul 2008 Meetup Group for
an opportunity to meet and greet your fellow Ron Paul
supporters and enjoy the culinary contributions of our talented
membership. Plan on bringing a batch of your favorite finger food
for us to sample. There will be award for the treat voted best in
class, H'ordurves, Entree, Desert. Original recipe or Store bought
items accepted (please remove all trace of packaging, LOL)
BYOB and plan on bringing an arrangement of leftovers home
with you.

Event starts at 4:00 PM for the 4:15 Kickoff of the Patriots vs.
Colts football game. Dinner will start at 5:30. Billiards and sign
making may be part of the festivities. Discussions of Politics and
Ron Paul are strongly permitted.

Hope to see some new faces!

RSVP for event address in Manchester, CT
item.name: Ron Paul Pot Luck Dinner Social
